title: Is it just me or is this new ban system terrible?
body:

replies.body:
It's not exactly "new", it's been pretty consistent for the last 2 years. 

First, 9 reports count the exact same as 1 report. It doesn't matter who they convince to report you, it won't do anything unless there's something to it.

Second, it scales up punishments. 10 game chat restriction, then 25 game chat restriction, then 2 weeks ban, then permaban. You can skip tiers for excessive toxicity.
It's been new since the Chinese company bought Riot games

Really now? The system has been new since before it was implemented?
